title: The Flowering city of London
creator_credit: Peter Bradford and World Wide Pictures
brief_description: The film traces the history of open spaces in the City of London from the Middle Ages to the present day, when gardens and open spaces are slowly being won back for the community. Shows the work of the Corporation of London and the Metropolitan Public Gardens Association. Written by John and Mary Daniels.
